text: Sorekara waga shito o, kare-ra no ashiato ni shitagawa se, sarani maruyamu no ko īsā o tsukawashi, fukuin o sazuke, mata kare-ra ni shitagau mono no mune ni hakuai to jihi no jō o mota seta. Daga kin'yoku no shūdōin-sei wa, kare-ra ga jibun de tsukutta mono de, ware ga kare-ra ni sore o shiji shite wa inai. Arrā no yorokobi o etai bakari ni shita kotodaga, kare-ra wa sore mo mamoraneba naranai yō ni wa mamotte inakatta. Sorede ware wa, kare-ra no naka no shinkō suru mono ni wa hōshō o ataeta. Daga kare-ra no ōku no mono wa arrā no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta
